parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the interactive messaging application to query.

parameters.name: BeginTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds. If you leave this parameter empty, the earliest available time is used.

parameters.name: DataCenter
parameters.description: The data center. It must be the same as the data center that was specified when you called the [CreateLiveMessageApp](~~2848162~~) operation to create the interactive messaging application. Valid values: cn-shanghai and ap-southeast-1 (Singapore).

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds. If you leave this parameter empty, the latest available time is used.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the group to query.

parameters.name: MsgType
parameters.description: The type of messages that you want to query. If you leave this parameter empty, all types of messages are queried.

parameters.name: NextPageToken
parameters.description: The starting page number for the query. If you leave this parameter empty, the query starts from the first page.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **10 to 50**.

parameters.name: SortType
parameters.description:
The sort order based on the time when the messages were sent. Valid values:

*   1: ascending order
*   2: descending order
